Does it dry up
like a raisin in the sun?
Or fester like a sore—

Does it stink like rotten meat?

Maybe it just sags
like a heavy load.
Or does it explode?"

398082804774215680.text: Warm video welcome from Congressional Military Family Caucus Co-Chair @CathyMcMorris Rodgers #CMFC Summit

398081917209161728.text: “We must see that our troops, veterans & their families have the support they need. Together, I know we can get the job done.” #CMFCSummit

398081848078647297.text: “I look forward to continuing the work of the Military Family Caucus & other 85 Members of Congress who make up this Caucus.” #CMFCSummit

398081737701347328.text: “These families are impacted in countless ways – seen and unseen – and we have an obligation to do right by them.” #CMFCSummit

398081657447542784.text: “We cannot forget the families they leave behind sacrifice just as much as our heroes who deploy on missions for our country.” #CMFCSummit

398081433471688705.text: “My father-in-law served in the U.S. military for several years and my wife was a military child.” #CMFCSummit

398081283017826304.text: “Whenever I meet with military families, two people who frequently come to mind are my father-in-law and my wife.” #CMFCSummit

398081158807703554.text: “The stories you share & input you provide help us work together to improve your quality of life & expand your opportunities.” #CMFCSummit

398081039425208320.text: “The issues discussed today are issues we will take back to Washington with us because they are of national importance.” #CMFCSummit
